alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 10:43PM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
